to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: DecTalk PC Reading Program
body:
Where did you get those Star Trek novels?  I wish I had a whole set of
all of them for all the shows.  

f you can give me a URL to all those novels, I would be glad.  



Thanks.
